documentation.description: GeoEntity represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Describes an ordered path across multiple entities or locations, used by EnergyFlow to represent its physical or logical route.
Firm represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Consolidated metric class capturing both fuel-related and operational measurements. Use metric_type to distinguish subcategories.
Policy represents a concept in the energy ontology.
EnergyEntity represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Represents entry points for energy transport infrastructure, consolidating EnergyTransport and EnergyPipeline functionality. Links to EnergyFlow via connected_segments.
EnergyStorageFacility represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Indicator represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Location represents a concept in the energy ontology.
GeoLine represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Facility represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Process represents a concept in the energy ontology.
GridEntity represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Defines the source and temporal attribution of a record in the system.
EmissionSpikeEvent represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Infrastructure represents a concept in the energy ontology.
TransportContractRelation represents a concept in the energy ontology.
CompressorOrBoosterStation represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Represents a directional segment in the energy transport network. Connects an EnergyEntryPoint to an EnergyExitPoint with defined capacity and energy type.
TemporalEntity represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Pipeline represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Models energy transfer across connected infrastructure, linking source and destination entities along a defined route.
Represents exit points for energy transport infrastructure. Terminal interface between transport and consumption or storage.
SocioEconomicEntity represents a concept in the energy ontology.
EnvironmentalEntity represents a concept in the energy ontology.
Scenario represents a concept in the energy ontology.
StateChange represents a concept in the energy ontology.
AttributeChange represents a concept in the energy ontology.

_metadata.note: All known validation, structural, semantic, and transport-specific issues have been resolved. Includes: realistic examples, metric consolidation, enriched documentation, temporal/provenance linking, transport segment modeling, and multilingual label verification.

https://test.energyontology.org/Canary#T.label_en: Canary TestEntity - Required for schema pass
https://test.energyontology.org/Canary#T.label_el: Οντότητα Δοκιμής - Απαραίτητη για έλεγχο πληρότητας
https://test.energyontology.org/Canary#T.description: Injected artificial class to confirm schema completeness and LLM compliance. Must appear in all valid output.

classes.description: Used to validate completeness and integrity of prompt-schema communication.

fields.description: Indicates whether a non-JSON output was attempted during structured prompt execution.

documentation.description: Used as a sentinel object for validating pipeline compliance with output structure contracts.
Represents a point-in-time change in an entity's status (e.g., from planned to operational).
Links actors to contractual obligations associated with infrastructure or resource rights.
